thread.title: WATCH: Giants' Odell Beckham Jr. does 1-handed windmill catch during warmups
thread.title_full: WATCH: Giants' Odell Beckham Jr. does 1-handed windmill catch during warmups

author: Jordan Raanan | NJ Advance Media for NJ.com
title: WATCH: Giants' Odell Beckham Jr. does 1-handed windmill catch during warmups
text:
A video posted by Jordan Raanan (@jraanan) on Oct 25, 2015 at 11:58am PDT EAST RUTHERFORD -- Giants wide receiver Odell Beckham Jr.'s hamstring must be feeling better. The one-handed pregame routine he's made famous before games was back Sunday afternoon before a matchup with the division rival Cowboys. 
As evidenced by this windmill catch and his entire pregame warmup, Beckham looked healthier than last week when he eschewed the 1-handed show for additional tradition.
